title: Clear noon, moderate-speed city driving with multiple braking events.
caption: The ego vehicle is driving on a busy city street with tall buildings on both sides. It is following a red car and there are several other cars and pedestrians nearby.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 1 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (clearNoon). The ego vehicle is almost stopped (average speed â‰ˆ 0.0 m/s). There are 30 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The road is a two-lane city street with a green traffic light on the left side of the frame. There are parked cars on the right side of the street and a large white building in the background. The weather is clear and sunny, and there are several tall buildings in the distance.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed and following the red car in front of it. It slows down and brakes frequently due to the busy traffic and pedestrians crossing the street. The driver needs to be cautious and attentive to avoid any accidents or collisions.
